short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension lets you login to websites supporting lnurl-auth with 1 click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Login to supporting websites by clicking on LNURL-AUTH links. Inspired by https://seed-auth.etleneum.com and complies with https://github.com/btcontract/lnurl-rfc/blob/master/lnurl-auth.md
Supports sites such as lnmarkets.com, etleneum.com etc.
